mapper.select: SELECT COUNTY_NAME countryName, CITY_NAME cityName FROM TB_AREAS A, TB_CITY C WHERE A.CITY_CODE = C.CITY_CODE AND AREAS_CODE = #{code}

SELECT REPORT_NO, REPORT_PLACE, TO_CHAR(REPORT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "REPORT_DATE", REPORT_TIME, NICKNAME, ANIMAL_NAME, ANIMAL_TYPE, BREEDE, AGE, TB_MISSING_REPORT.STATUS, CONTENT, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_MISSING_REPORT JOIN TB_REPORT_ATTACHMENT USING(REPORT_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TB_ANIMAL USING(ANIMAL_NAME) WHERE tb_missing_report.status='N' ORDER BY REPORT_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NICKNAME, CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITE_DATE", VIEW_COUNT, CATEGORY_NO, USER_NO, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_ANIMAL_BOARD JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) JOIN TB_BOARD_FILE USING (BOARD_NO) ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NICKNAME, CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITE_DATE", VIEW_COUNT, CATEGORY_NO, USER_NO, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_ANIMAL_BOARD JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) JOIN TB_BOARD_FILE USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME = #{category} ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NICKNAME,
CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITE_DATE", VIEW_COUNT, CATEGORY_NO, USER_NO,
FROM TB_ANIMAL_BOARD JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO)
WHERE
TITLE
NICKNAME
CONTENT
LIKE '%' || #{keyword}|| '%'
ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MISSING_REPORT ( REPORT_NO, REPORT_PLACE, CONTENT, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TIME, USER_NO, ANIMAL_NAME, STATUS, ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPORT.NEXTVAL, #{reportPlace}, #{content}, #{reportDate}, #{reportTime}, #{userNo}, #{animalName}, DEFAULT )
INSERT INTO TB_REPORT_ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHEMENT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, REPORT_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, SEQ_REPORT.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_FILE ( ATTACHMENT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{reportNo} )
INSERT INTO TB_BOARD_FILE( ATTACHMENT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_BOARDFILE.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, SEQ_ANIMAL_BOARD.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_ANIMAL_BOARD( BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, CATEGORY_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_ANIMAL_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, #{categoryNo}, #{userNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT ANIMAL_NO, ANIMAL_TYPE, BREEDE, ANIMAL_NAME, GENDER, PORTRAIT, AGE, NUTRIED, USER_NO FROM TB_ANIMAL WHERE USER_NO = #{user} AND ANIMAL_NAME = #{animalName}

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NICKNAME, CATEGORY_NAME, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "WRITE_DATE", VIEW_COUNT, CATEGORY_NO, USER_NO, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_ANIMAL_BOARD JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING(USER_NO) JOIN TB_BOARD_FILE USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
